mapper.select: SELECT o.order_no, o.product_code, TO_CHAR(o.out_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') out_date, o.order_count, o.plan_count, o.order_count - o.plan_count unplan_count, p.product_name FROM orders o, product p WHERE o.order_count != o.plan_count AND o.product_code = p.product_code AND o.out_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{planDtS}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{planDtE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.update: UPDATE plan SET plan_date = #{planDate}, plan_name = #{planName}, comments = #{comments} WHERE plan_code = #{planCode}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT d.product_lot, d.plan_code, d.order_no, d.product_code, d.comments, d.work_count, TO_CHAR(d.work_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') work_date, TO_CHAR(o.out_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') out_date, o.order_count, o.plan_count, o.order_count - o.plan_count unplan_count, p.product_name FROM detailplan d, orders o, product p WHERE plan_code = #{planCode} AND d.product_code = p.product_code AND d.order_no = o.order_no
SELECT product_name FROM product WHERE product_code = #{productCode}

select.if: SELECT DISTINCT m.material_code, m.material_name, i.lot_no material_lot, F_MAT_COUNT(i.lot_no) material_count FROM material m, inout i, bom b WHERE m.material_code = i.material_code AND b.material_code = m.material_code AND b.product_code = #{productCode} AND F_MAT_COUNT(i.lot_no) != 0
